import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-password-strength', templateUrl: './password-strength.component.html', styleUrls: ['./password-strength.component.css'], }) export class PasswordStrengthComponent { password: string = ''; calculateStrength() { // No need to perform calculations here since the strength is determined by CSS classes } }
Password Password strength will be evaluated instantly!

Strong
